entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
